spec.name: Dasos Restaurant
spec.description: Dasos Restaurant is a contemporary dining establishment in the suburban Dar Bouazza area of Casablanca, offering an **International menu**. Restaurants in this area cater to a modern clientele, often featuring sophisticated design, high-quality service, and diverse food options ranging from Mediterranean to other global cuisines. Its location further outside the main city center suggests it is a destination spot for local residents and weekend diners seeking a modern suburban leisure experience.
